title: MyVerse on Wild 'N Out, Viral Freestyles & Being the Top Opp in Female Battle Rap
description:
MyVerse went from poetry to battle rap pretty fast and she is now one of the finest battle rappers, known for her crazy freestyles and witty comebacks. She talks about being on Wild & Out, the battle rap industry, not getting the bag she wants, ghostwriting for other artists, and more. ----- 00:00 Intro 1:43 Lush asks is she was a Duff growing up 4:50 Diz gives her props as an emcee 6:00 Working with Grind Time, they reached out when she was doing poetry 7:50 Dizaster actually has fire music but will never drop it 9:11 "Lush says she has the personality of an ugly girl" 12:06 She battled Madness, a bigger rapper who yet had fat jokes towards her 13:32 Being the first battle rap couple celebrity with Storm 19:21 Department stores freestyle 22:15 Department stores freestyle was not written 23:57 Female not writing their rhymes in hip hop 30:18 Being a regular on Wild & Out, what is scripted and what is not 32:04 Most of her crazy bars have been cut, and edited out before airing so it looks like she lost 33:22 Dizaster is NOT doing a "Compliment Battle" that lowkey promotes traditional battle rap as violent 44:23 Females are not paid what they're supposed to be paid between men and women, Dizaster says most women are not superstars like men, that's why they're paid less 53:57 Other girls build their resumes because they take any bag while she's way more selective 55:23 MyVerse got backlash for NOT battling for free 57:35 She is so good that people doubted that she wrote her own bars so she constantly showcases her skills ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps!
